text: Alexander Gordon Jump (April 1, 1932 â€“ September 22, 2003) was an American actor. He is known for playing Mr. Horton in a two-part special of Diff'rent Strokes. He is also known for playing the Maytag repairman. He was born in Dayton, Ohio. Jump died in Los Angeles, California from pulmonary fibrosis, aged 71. ==References== ==Other websites== * Category:1932 births Category:2003 deaths Category:American movie actors Category:American television actors Category:Deaths from pulmonary fibrosis Category:Disease- related deaths in Los Angeles Category:Actors from Dayton, Ohio
